name: Rocket Cop
description:
Rocket Cop is a third-person shooter game set in a destructible dystopian city inspired by action movies of the 80's and 90's. Grab your trusty Grenade Launcher and Jetpack and bring justice to the rooftops of uh,.... some unnamed metropolis! It doesn't matter, you're a cop with the full authority to use lethal force! Take out those damn perps! 

Credits:

Game design - Karl Horn

Music and Voices - Karl Feuerstake

Sound and Implementation - Nathan Frazier

Known bugs: Clicking on the button for the settings menu causes an interface error that requires restarting the game, so please don't click it (there are no real options there anyway)

Note: If you are having trouble playing the game in your current browser, such as if the screen just appears as a blank magenta canvas, try a different browser. 

Godot source code is available on github.
